package.name: xpressbuy_product_variants
package.summary: Commerce Anywhere is a service that allows a retailer to drive in-the-moment purchases of their products.
package.description:
Main purpose of this extension is to support product variants.
- It is not possible to get the associated products of Configurable products. Each associated product is listed again as another completely different product. - This extension exposes methods which allows extension users to get variants of configurable products. - Which makes it easy for customer to select product options (color, size etc.) during 'Add to Cart'. - User will have choice to choose various product variants.
package.notes: Changes to getting attributes for configurable products.
